text: Club Atlético Junior,DIMAYOR Official Website also known simply as Junior, is a Colombian football club from Barranquilla, that currently plays in the Categoría Primera A. They play their home games at the Estadio Metropolitano Roberto Melendez. ==Honours== ===National Honours=== *Categoría Primera A: 9 ::1977, 1980, 1993, 1995, 2004-II, 2010-I, 2011-II, 2018-II, 2019-I *Copa Colombia: 2 ::2015, 2017 *Superliga de Colombia: 1 ::2019 === International === *Reebok Cup: 1 ::1997 ==References== Category:Colombian football clubs Category:1924 establishments in South America Category:1920s establishments in Colombia Category:Atlántico Department
title: Atlético Junior
